title: laziness
content: take red chilli fry 1minute with jiggery and ghee and make a fine paste and eat frequently

title: body laziness
content: drumstick leaves soup can reduce body laziness

title: body laziness with pain
content: eat drumstick leaves fried with country sugar and ghee

title: body heat
content: to get rid of body heat eat fenugreek thrice a day

title: physical agility
content: mix dried ginger powder with milk and drink every night before bed

title: laziness
content: drink basil juice with honey to get instant fresh

title: to increase glucose level
content: eat dates every night and drink milk to increase glucose content in body

title: body laziness for girls
content: make a porridge of wheat brokens and consume daily

title: body fresh
content: apply green gram flour and turmeric all over body and take a bath

title: lazy dizziness
content: grind scutch grass and mix with butter and eat for 48 days to get rid of dizzeness
